climbs.name: We Live Here
climbs.fa: Connor Messner with help from Kiyana Pulido

content.description: Sit start off of a left hand pinch on arete and right had on small lip.   First crux is a gaston move and second is the throw to the minor lip before the top.
content.location: The start is left of Keyhole on the same boulder.    Right hand start hold is the foot for Keyhole and notably chalked with the left hand running the arete for a moment.

content.description: Sidepull and stem up the slab to a gaston feature in the small roof. Use some foot trickery (very height-dependent) to reach good crimps. Top out more easily. Stretch your hip flexors.
content.protection: One pad and a spotter should do it.
content.location: On the right side of the large warmup boulder split by a deep offwidth (a couple minutes past the first humongous boulder you reach.)

content.description: Directly opposite on the warm up boulder from stems and seeds, traverse right, following the big curved ledge. Then move up the pocketed face. High ball top out on huge jugs. Easy and fun.
content.location: On the warm up boulder, directly opposite stems and seeds.

content.description: Follow sloping, sandy pinches up the West face. Poor rock quality but fairly classic features make a unique problem.
content.location: West Face of the boulder left of Stems and Seeds and Keyhole.

content.description: Slabby problem on the warm up boulder with tiny edges and crimps after the obvious keyhole.  Lots of different ways to send. Saw a dyno to the ledge under top out. Still working on it.

Technical, slopey, vertical arete with slabby face in the start. Named after the boulder lying on the ground next to the problem. This boulder makes a two foot ledge in 1/3 of the landing zone, and adds scare factor to the balancy, insecure moves. One of the most classic lines at the Anvils, but rarely gets done.
content.protection: Use plenty of pads and spotters.
content.location: On the Southwest arete of the warm-up boulders, just right of Stems and Seeds.

content.description: Fun, crimpy, thought provoking arete exactly opposite of the keyhole
content.location: NE corner of the stems and seeds boulder

content.description: This includes all the on or immediately near the seeds n' stems boulder.
